title: Trusting Weekend
description: This body of work, Sandwyrm Errors, has particular significance to me because to much of my childhood took place white watching SMPTE bands. Most times i watched in silence, sometimes i hummed to the beep, or even did my homeword in front of it.

title: Stripped Thought
description: A short, average built, dark skinned man with small ears, a broad nose, a cleft chin and soft, prominent, hazel eyes. He has long nails, seems intimidating, wears a natural-looking foundation to even his complexion and shocking pink blush, and has patchy stubble.

title: The Red Souls
description: A tall, fat, bronze skinned woman with very thin lips, small ears and dark, round, brown eyes. She has nice cologne, wears clean, fine clothes, and seems aggressive.

title: Husband of Serpents
description: A short, stout, caramel skinned woman with angular eyebrows, mysterious, rounded, brown eyes, a wide face and puffy cheeks. She has faint freckles.

title: The Pirates's Dreamer
description: A slender, fair skinned woman with well-groomed eyebrows, a round face, puffy cheeks and expressive, round, light brown eyes. She has a small birthmark on her left foot, and seems conniving.

title: The Guardian of the Nobody
description: A bodybuilder-like, fair skinned woman with soft, wide set, brown eyes. She seems stoic, and wears new, hippie clothes. She is looking for something.

title: Son in the Pleasure
description: A tall, average built, orange skinned person with neat eyebrows and a large nose. They wear gold earrings in both ears, have patchy stubble, have straight, dark blonde hair, and wear subtle blush and complimentary eyeliner.

title: Vacant Flight
description: A 5 4 tall, olive skinned person with a wide face, large ears, a monobrow and hollow cheeks. They appear androgynous, and act feminine. They have an impressive beard, and have a distinctive mole on their torso.

title: The Green Voyages
description: A 5 2 tall, gray skinned man with no eyebrows, deep-set, little, hazel eyes and puffy lips. He wears perfectly pressed, casual clothes, has multiple tattoos on his upper back and lower back, seems aloof, and has a cheap perfume.

title: Spirits of Sword
description: A short, muscular, ruddy skinned woman with defined cheekbones, deep, little, hazel eyes and angular eyebrows. She has multiple tattoos on her left arm and right leg.

title: The Consort's Gift
description: A tall, heavy, golden skinned woman with a narrow face. She has curly, brown hair. She is carrying a book.
